Energy Overview

The world has an energy crisis - Lets solve it!

This is a series of projects that are energy independant or alternatve in nature

Projected Series Path

I make a few bicycles that dont work, and maybe one that does.

I have a great idea for a teaser or a trailer. Somewhere in the world, someone is sitting on the road with a flat tire, me somewhere else, i get an odd look on my face and listen in the distance, then say, i sense someone is in trouble! i change into my mad science outfit and show up on the scene. it is a green vw bug very similar to mine. the person in distress says oh thank goodness your here! I imediately ignore the tire and climb under the car, then come out with the entire engine in my hands, I say, this here is your problem, its running on primitive fossile fuels! then the scene cuts and and my very odd vw is in its place. I say there you go! its fixed. you now have to and then i rattle off some confusing technical specifications, and leave with the tire still flat.

after trailer we go into the episodes adventure of making the biomass vw and successive messes.
